thread.title: Richard O - Cheshire
thread.title_full: Kiddies Kingdom reviewed by Richard O - Cheshire

author: Richard O - Cheshire
title: Richard O - Cheshire
text:
We had been scouring the Internet for a cot bed with the arrival of our first child on the horizon and after much deliberation and Science like fact based research, we fell upon the decision to purchase our OBaby Stamford Cot Bed from the URL of Kiddies Kingdom..
Following an initial phone call to a very polite and helpful customer service agent from their Dewsbury base to confirm stock and shipping options, the pennies were counted and an order was placed.. No less than 20 hours later a mini cot bed arrived in flat pack form to my office.. (The ability to use an alternative shipping address is always a bonus!)
The packaging was complete and care had been taken to ensure no damage would deflate our initial joy of Kiddies Kingdom's very competitive price structure. The build was completed in less than 30 minutes that night (Bravo OBaby on an excellent product and simple design!) and we our now the proud owners of our first born's first cot bed..
It may have been fluke or luck but as a manufacturer, retailer and consumer myself, I cannot fault the service or speed at which Kiddies Kingdom completed my order and have no doubt that I will be using them again in future as my journey as a first time father looking for competitive prices and fantastic products steps up a gear in the third trimester..
Your sincerely,
A grateful father to be with growing online needs.
